title: Sparkling Surprise
summary: Find a glittering trinket Alicia can gift to Laura.
description: Alicia wants to surprise Laura with something bright. A Wind Charm from town would be perfect.
journal: Alicia asked me to bring her a Wind Charm so she can finally give Laura a proper gift.
onAcceptLog: You promised Alicia you'd find a charm that catches Laura's eye.
onCompleteLog: Alicia clasps the charm to her chest, already planning her gift.

title: Golden Promise
summary: Secure a flawless ring so Laura can finish her design.
description: Laura needs a Goldweave Ring to complete a commission. She hinted that the lower floors hide what she needs, but merchants sometimes carry them, too.
journal: Laura asked me to bring her a Goldweave Ring. If I find one, she'll owe me.
onAcceptLog: You agreed to hunt down a Goldweave Ring for Laura.
onCompleteLog: Laura inspects the ring, then presses a heavy pouch into your hand.
